mapper.sql:
SELECT W.ID, W.WORK_TIME, U.HRCODE EMP_CODE, U.USERNAME, U.USERALIAS, W.CATEGORY, W.PROJECT_ID, DECODE(P.CATEGORY, NULL,'0', '', '0', 1) WT_TYPE, P.WBS_NUMBER WBS_CODE, P.PROJECT_NAME WBS_NAME, W.PROJECT_NAME, PU1.ROLE, DECODE(PU1.ROLE, NULL, NULL, '', NULL, '1', '1', '0', '0') PROJECT_ROLE, U1.HRCODE PROJECT_LEADER, U1.USERALIAS LEADER_USERNAME, NVL(W.WORKING_HOUR,0) WORKING_HOUR, W.APPROVER FROM BG_WORKINGHOUR_INFO W LEFT JOIN BG_SYS_USER U ON U.USERNAME = W.WORKER LEFT JOIN BG_PROJECT_INFO P ON P.ID = W.PROJECT_ID LEFT JOIN BG_PROJECT_USER PU1 ON W.PROJECT_ID = PU1.PROJECT_ID AND PU1.HRCODE = U.HRCODE AND ROWNUM = 1 LEFT JOIN BG_PROJECT_USER PU2 ON W.PROJECT_ID = PU2.PROJECT_ID AND PU2.ROLE = '1' LEFT JOIN BG_SYS_USER U1 ON U1.HRCODE = PU2.HRCODE AND ROWNUM = 1 WHERE 1 = 1
AND 1=2
AND TO_CHAR(W.WORK_TIME, 'yyyy') = #{yearName, jdbcType = VARCHAR}
AND W.WORK_TIME BETWEEN TO_DATE(#{startDate, jdbcType = VARCHAR},'yyyy-MM-dd') AND TO_DATE(#{endDate, jdbcType = VARCHAR},'yyyy-MM-dd')
AND TO_CHAR(W.WORK_TIME, 'yyyy-MM') = #{monthName, jdbcType = VARCHAR}
1=2
AND U.HRCODE IS NOT NULL AND W.STATUS = '3' AND W.VALID = 1
mapper.select: SELECT M.EMP_CODE, M.PROJECT_ID, M.WT_TYPE, M.WBS_CODE, M.WBS_NAME, M.PROJECT_ROLE, M.PROJECT_LEADER FROM () M GROUP BY M.EMP_CODE, M.PROJECT_ID, M.WT_TYPE, M.WBS_CODE, M.WBS_NAME, M.PROJECT_ROLE, M.PROJECT_LEADER
SELECT M.EMP_CODE, SUM(M.WORKING_HOUR) WORKING_HOUR FROM () M GROUP BY M.EMP_CODE
SELECT M.EMP_CODE, M.PROJECT_ID, SUM(M.WORKING_HOUR) WORKING_HOUR FROM () M GROUP BY M.EMP_CODE, M.PROJECT_ID
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BG_INTERFACE_BSP (wt_year, wt_season, emp_code, wt_type, project_id, wbs_code, wbs_name, total_input_time, input_time, input_percentage, project_leader, project_role, update_time) VALUES (#{WT_YEAR,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{WT_SEASON,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{EMP_CODE,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{WT_TYPE,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{PROJECT_ID,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{WBS_CODE,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{WBS_NAME,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{TOTAL_INPUT_TIME,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{INPUT_TIME,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{INPUT_PERCENTAGE,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{PROJECT_LEADER,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{PROJECT_ROLE,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, to_date(#{update_time,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss') )
